email_chain.subject: Rate Inquiry - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 12,000 MT of fertilizer from Santos to Durban. Could you provide a rate estimate for this shipment? We are considering CFR terms.

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards,
Laura Miller
Seabridge Freight

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer a rate of $45/MT for the shipment of 12,000 MT of fertilizer from Santos to Durban under CFR terms. The vessel available is the SEA HORIZON, with a DWT of 50,000 and LOA of 200m.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Michael Carter
Ocean Cargo Network

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for the quick response. The rate of $45/MT seems a bit high compared to market rates. Could you consider lowering it to $42/MT? Also, could you confirm the laycan for the SEA HORIZON?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I understand your concern regarding the rate. After discussing with the owners, we can offer a revised rate of $43/MT. The laycan for the SEA HORIZON is 25th to 30th March.

Please confirm if this is acceptable so we can proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Michael

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for the revised offer. We agree to the rate of $43/MT and the laycan of 25th to 30th March. Please proceed with the booking and send us the necessary documentation.

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Fertilizer Shipment from Santos to Durban
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the booking and send you the booking confirmation and bill of lading details shortly. The demurrage rate is set at $15,000 per day pro rata.

Best regards,
Michael
